definition: Manchuria
Manchu ethnic group
to fill/full/filled/packed/fully/completely/quite/to reach the limit/to satisfy/satisfied/contented
continent/island in a river
Manzhouli county level city, Mongolian Manzhuur xot, in Hulunbuir 呼倫貝爾|呼伦贝尔[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3], Inner Mongolia
Manzhouli county level city, Mongolian Manzhuur xot, in Hulunbuir 呼倫貝爾|呼伦贝尔[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3], Inner Mongolia
Manchukuo

sentences.english: When you emperor of Manchoukuo, what rights did you have?
sentences.chinese: 你在当满洲国皇帝的期间，有什么权利吗？

sentences.english: Fu Manchu seeks the sceptre of Ghenghis Khan so he can rule Asia.
sentences.chinese: 傅满洲寻求成吉思汗的权杖，所以他能统治亚洲。

sentences.english: They began to fraternize with the Manchurian people and then with the 8th Route Army.
sentences.chinese: 他们开始同满洲人民来往，接着又同八路军来往。

sentences.english: Russia was pushing down through Manchuria to Corea.
sentences.chinese: 俄国正通过满洲向朝鲜推进。

sentences.english: Second, why did they choose to participate in Manchukuo?
sentences.chinese: 其次，为什么他们选择参加满洲国之列？

sentences.english: Then came the Manchus, who set up the Ch'ing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 然后满洲人来了，建立清朝。

sentences.english: They realize acutely what the Japanese have done in Manchuria and Shantung .
sentences.chinese: 他们清醒地知道日本人在满洲里和山东的所作所为。

sentences.english: The British General Gordon helped the Manchu Govt put down the Taiping Rebellion.
sentences.chinese: 英国的戈登将军帮助满洲政府镇压太平天国运动。

sentences.english: Above the door there is a plaque bearing the same name in both Chinese and Manchurian characters.
sentences.chinese: 门以上有斑块轴承相同的名字在中文和满洲里的角色。

sentences.english: That emergency was now on them and the generalissimo , himself, flew to Manchuria.
sentences.chinese: 现在局势确很危急，蒋介石亲自飞来满洲督战。

sentences.english: Puyi was installed by the Japanese Manchukuo government as a puppet ruler in Changchun.
sentences.chinese: 傅仪被日本伪满洲政府在长春任命为傀儡统治者。

sentences.english: China neither recognized Manchukuo nor was able to recover Manchuria .
sentences.chinese: 中国不承认满洲国也无法收复满洲。

sentences.english: China neither recognized Manchukuo nor was able to recover Manchuria .
sentences.chinese: 中国不承认满洲国也无法收复满洲。

sentences.english: The puppet Manchukuo imperial museum is located in the northeast corner of the city of Changchun.
sentences.chinese: 伪满洲国皇陈列馆位于长春市东北角。

sentences.english: Some aging higher officers inherited from the Manchurian days were sacked.
sentences.chinese: 从满洲时代遗留下来的一些年老的高级军官给撤换了。

Manchu ethnic group of Liaoning province

a Manchu
the Qing court (as government of China)

Tsarist Russia/abbr. for 沙皇俄國|沙皇俄国[Sha1 huang2 E2 guo2]
